titlestmt.titleproper: Furbush (Margaret) collection of Janet Lewis material
Guide to the Margaret K. Furbush collection of Janet Lewis material M2064
titlestmt.author: Malgorzata Schaefer

publicationstmt.publisher: Department of Special Collections and University Archives

note.p: This is a listing of materials rather than a true finding aid.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2018-03-02 14:11:28 -0800.

repository.corpname: Department of Special Collections and University Archives

did.unittitle: Margaret K. Furbush collection of Janet Lewis material

origination.label: source
origination.corpname: Brick Row Book Shop (San Francisco, Calif.)

relatedmaterial.head: Related Materials
relatedmaterial.p: There are other collections of Janet Lewis including ones containing media.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Janet Lewis was an American novelist and poet, married to Yvor Winters, also an American poet and a literary critic. Janet also composed librettos. Margaret Furbush was a Stanford Library friend who worked in the Dept. of Special Collections, and was on the board of the Library Associates. She was the primary force behind the revival of the Library Associatesâ€™ journal, Imprint.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Materials consist of documents and media related to Janet Lewis and her writing, including correspondence, Lewis' manuscripts and correspondence related to them, and printed material.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Open for research. Note that material must be requested at least 36 hours in advance of intended use. Audio-visual materials are not available in original format and must be reformatted to a digital use copy.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: While Special Collections is the owner of the physical and digital items, permission to examine collection materials is not an authorization to publish. These materials are made available for use in research, teaching, and private study. Any transmission or reproduction beyond that allowed by fair use requires permission from the owners of rights, heir(s) or assigns. See: http://library.stanford.edu/spc/using-collections/permission-publish.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [identification of item], Margaret K. Furbush collection of Janet Lewis material (M2064). Department of Special Collections and University Archives, Stanford University Libraries, Stanford, California.

controlaccess.corpname: Brick Row Book Shop (San Francisco, Calif.)
